segments.text: Ah , thank you . Please bring your luggage here for inspection .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . But is there anything wrong ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's just a regular inspection . Do you have anything to declare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got 6 packets of cigarettes and 2 bottles of champagne . Besides , I have two cameras , one is for my own use , and the other is a gift .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the cigarettes and the champagne are not in excess of the duty-free allowance . But according to our law , each passenger is allowed only one camera duty-free . You ' ll have to pay duty for the other one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Where shall I pay duty for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please wait a minute . I'll make out the duty memo ... Here you are . Take this and pay to the woman over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've paid for it . Here's the receipt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . I hope you ' ll enjoy your stay in America .
segments.speaker: S1
